entries: At least one of your parents is a member of the notorious Red Mantis assassins, merciless killers for hire who rarely fail to claim their marks. Whether on purpose or by simple exposure, you were trained from a young age in the art of stalking and killing people.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Stealth} skill and the {@skill Lore||Assassin Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Assurance} skill feat with {@skill Stealth}.
